data.message: how can you get real person help? my family friends and i are completely being harassed and nothing seems to help

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Tige. If you feel you're in immediate danger, please contact your local authorities. Depending on the seriousness of the situation, you can learn more about the tools Facebook offers to help you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/2e102WO. You can also find more information, tools and resources on our Bullying Prevention Hub here: http://bit.ly/2eVQGZN. -Nick
